attributes.action: Traffic wardens shouldn't be allowed to work 'undercover'
attributes.additional_details:
Traffic wardens that purposefully lurk near and around cars that have expiring tickets etc are causing the public great discomfort in these severe economic times.

We, the public, ask that the uniforms for all traffic wardens (public and private) is updated to make their visibility more know. Example: High-visibility jackets.

It is simply unacceptable that non-uniformed traffic wardens (sometimes those who aren't even on duty) are allowed to write tickets for drivers, especially if the wardens are simply wasting their own time to try meet a local 'quota' for their employer/local council office.
